definitions.definition: the practice of obeying rules or requests made by people in authority

examples.text: procedures that must be followed to ensure full compliance with the law
Safety measures were carried out in compliance with paragraph 6 of the building regulations.
The compliance officer is responsible for enforcing policies and procedures.

definitions.definition: the quality of being too willing to agree with somebody or do what they want

examples.text: He was appalled by his parents' unquestioning compliance with the regime.
